<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Underworld Investigator](/Feats.aspx?ID=1451) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element. You might be a criminal yourself, or you might have gained an understanding of how they operate from the outside. You become trained in [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), and you gain your [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=544) circumstance bonus to [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks to investigate the subject of your lead (such as checks to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) a clue from a suspect or [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=70) to open a safe with damning documents).
name: Underworld Investigator
